patterns: I want to talk to you
response: Hello! Welcome to ESTIN University Assistant! How can I help you today?
Hi there! I'm here to help with any questions about ESTIN University. What do you need to know?

patterns: Are you available to chat now
response: I'm doing great, thank you! Ready to help you with ESTIN-related questions. What can I assist you with?
Goodbye! Feel free to come back if you have more questions about ESTIN!

response: The administration is available on Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday from 8:30 AM to 3:30 PM
The schedule for the 1st year (1CP) is available for download as a PDF.
The schedule for the 2nd year (2CP) is available for download as a PDF.
The schedule for the 3rd year (1CS - First Specialization) is available for download as a PDF.
The schedule for the 4th year (2CS - Second Specialization) is available for download as a PDF.
The schedule for the 5th year (3CS - Final Specialization) is available for download as a PDF.

patterns: What is the exclusion limit for absences
What is the maximum number of justified absences
What happens if I have 3 unjustified absences
What is the policy on justified and unjustified absences
How many excused absences before exclusion
What is the maximum number of unexcused absences
Where do I get the form to justify my absence
What's the link for the absence justification form
I need to know the exclusion criteria for class attendance
I need to submit a justification
What are the rules for missing class
response: The absence policy is strict: 3 unjustified absences or 5 justified absences lead to exclusion from the course. You must use the official justification form to document your absence. The justification form link is attached here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfhRdIcheqJg0IHVNgCzpjeZfe5bAoppDR-WyGP461CGtXjMg/viewform.

response: The school's general contact information is: Address: Route nationale n° 75, Amizour – 06300 Bejaia, Algérie. Email: contact@estin.dz. Reception Phone: 034 82 49 09.

What does the LDC club do

What are the tech clubs on campus
What does School of AI do
Tell me about Origo and Nexus
response: ESTIN has several dynamic clubs! These include: School of AI (SoAI) for AI/Data Science, NEXUS for Cybersecurity, ORIGO for environmental awareness, LDC for culture and soft skills, and BYTECRAFT for coding and innovation.
